vsParam:
Sorry to disturb you!
Our assignment are done~
Ah, you guys. Put it on that table.

Uh... Bergamot Sensei, you seem quite busy.
What's going on?

Yeah, I'm handling the synthesis commission
sent by the Palace.
Wow, a commission from the Palace!? Sounds amazing!

The headmaster and I planned to synthesize this
together. But he got too busy, so I have to do it all by myself.

But this is a high precision synthesis, it requires a lot of time
for preparation. I didn't have the time to gather ingredients...

Right, [px].
Can you help me gather ingredients if you have time?

I've written down all ingredients I need here.
I'm on a tight schedule, so, please hurry.

Yeah, sure! Got it!
Let's go gather them, [px]!
Bergamot Sensei, we have gathered all the ingredients you need!

Thank you. Can you lay them out there?
I'm tied up right now.

O~kay, the synthesis has started?
Let me see...

Hey, [px].
Do you have any idea what Bergamot Sensei is doing?

Um, I mean, we use the same ingredients.
How come the results look so different...

No matter how complicated the steps are, it's still just synthesis.
You'll be able to do that sooner or later if you study hard.

I haven't taught this part yet. It's impressive that
just catching a glimpse of it can give you a flavor of what I'm doing.
You can come closer as long as you keep quiet.

She does such complicated synthesis effortlessly...
Sensei is really someone who has mastered all four elements.
Although we only see her in class lately...

Bergamot Sensei is really
an outstanding alchemist...
